title: Handwritten font to pair with DIN Rounded? Any suggestions?
content:
Hello

Can anyone recommend some good handwritten fonts that will work with DIN Rounded, all caps please?

The pairing is for a new tech brand that I'm working on and it's aimed at young children - teenagers.

Thanks in advance for amy help.

:)
author: mcfee

comments.content:
Shinntype’s [Handsome Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142848/http:/shinntype.com/typefaces/handsome/) is a cursive handwritten\* script that has a rounded style in weights from Thin to Extra Bold.

\*Quite literally: I wrote it in Fontographer with a stylus and Wacom tablet.
